author: boudoul
body:
Following a suggestion from @davidlange6 , I created a separated file (upgradeWorkflowComponents.py) which does contain the definition and the components  of the upgrade workflows - I didn't change anything neither in the numbering nor the definitions (just moved what was in relval_steps into upgradeWorkflowComponents.py and import it) .
This will definitely make relval_steps a bit lighter, and will facilitate the introduction of the upgrade worflows in the 7X version  of runthematrix (once we will be ready to do so) without having to deal with a giant relval_steps.py
title: cleaning RunTheMatrix (dedicated python file for the upgrade workflows definition)
